name: Sarinth Steelseeker

flavor_text: "This metal jink is ugly, but it's got its uses."

name: Battery Bearer
oracle_text:
Creatures you control have "{T}: add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell."
Whenever you cast an artifact spell with mana value 6 or greater, draw a card.

name: Wing Commando
oracle_text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "The welds are weaker at the top."

name: Scatter Ray
oracle_text: COunter target artifact or creature spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text: Mishra's army demanded the secrets of the Third Path. Hurkyl's followers graciously showed them.

name: Retrieval Agent
oracle_text: {2}: Retrieval Agent gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The humming tome burned his leather glove, nearly taking his hand along with it. Then a strange power coursed through him.

name: Involuntary Cooldown
oracle_text: Tap up to two target artifacts and/or creatures. Put two stun counters on each of them. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
flavor_text:
"Back to the ivory towers! This won't hold for long!"
—Vayor, Third Path cryomancer

name: Desynchronize
oracle_text: Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Before Kaya could pull Teferi's spirit back, the overloaded temporal anchor failed, and he was set adrift in the currents of time.

name: Curate
oracle_text:
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Aha! This must be one of the ancient keys to... No, wait. It's just another puzzle toy."

name: Air Marshal
oracle_text: {3}: Target Soldier gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Today our blades remember Kroog! May the seven brass gods be with us!"

name: Prison Sentence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Prison Sentence enters the battlefield, scry 2.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: War prisoners were ineffective political pawns, as neither brother cared enough to trade for them.

name: Military Discipline
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Military Discipline enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.

name: Loran's Escape
oracle_text: Target artifact or creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: As Terisia City burned, Feldon pressed the sylex into Loran's hands and urged her to run. Hope ran with her.

name: Deadly Riposte
oracle_text: Deadly Riposte deals 3 damage to target tapped creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Automatons are fast, precise, and timeless, but they all share one weakness: predictability. Learn their patterns. Strike when they're vulnerable."
—Horance, Urzan general

name: Sarinth Greatwurm
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever a land enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: "Hostile Negotiations"
oracle_text: Exile the top three cards of your library in a face-down pile, then exile the next top three cards of your library in another face-down pile. Look at the cards in each pile, then turn a pile of your choice face up. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put all cards in the chosen pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life.

name: Yotian Tactician
oracle_text: Other Soldiers you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Time for the Iron Alliance to remind the qadir's armor how inhospitable the Sword Marches can be."

name: Meticulous Excavation
oracle_text: {2}{W}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. If it has unearth, instead exile it, then return that card to its owner's hand. Activate only during your turn.
flavor_text: "Remember, students, if it's glowing, humming, or whirring, don't touch it!"

name: Kill-Zone Acrobat
oracle_text: Whenever Kill-Zone Acrobat attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, Kill-Zone Acrobat gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her circus training proved surprisingly valuable on the battlefield.

name: Ravenous Gigamole
oracle_text: When Ravenous Gigamole enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a creature card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Gigamole. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

name: Thraxodemon
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or artifact: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Urza and Mishra weren't the only denizens of Terisiare to covet the powerstones' energy.

name: Gixian Skullflayer
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Gixian Skullflayer.
flavor_text: "With every culling, we bring this world closer to *compleation*."

name: Dredging Claw
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It's can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you may attach Dredging Claw to it.
Equip {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Scrapwork Rager
oracle_text:
When Scrapwork Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Scrapwork Mutt
oracle_text:
When Scrapwork Mutt enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Whirling Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I will trust desert steel in Fallaji hands over a soulless machine any day."
—Hajar, Mishra's bodyguard

name: Excavation Explosion
oracle_text: Excavation Explosion deals 3 damage to any target. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: Urza's engineers could take weeks to dig out a powerstone. The goblins weren't so painstaking.

name: Unleash Shell
oracle_text: Unleash Shell deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor_text: The new cannon's destructive power more than made up for its unpredictable blast radius.

name: Blanchwood Prowler
oracle_text: When Blanchwood Prowler enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Blanchwood Prowler. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Perimeter Patrol
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Perimeter Patrol gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Fallaji quickly learned that the Kher Ridges held too many caves and valleys to be surveyed from the air alone.

name: Shoot Down
oracle_text: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text: Gwenna stayed her hand only once, to save young Harbin's life—a mistake she would never repeat.

name: Gemhide Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text:
"The land is weary. Even Skyshroud is depleted. We must find another source of mana—one that is growing despite our withering world."
—Freyalise

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"There's a certain beauty in destruction. Some will consider this war a masterpiece."
—Ashnod

name: Tower Worker
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}: Add {C}. If you control creatures named Mine Worker and Power Plant Worker, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

Flying, haste
When Swiftgear Drake enters the battlefield, put up to one target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

Flash

flavor_text:
"Artifice is not the only form of creation."
—Titania

name: Tomakul Honor Guard
oracle_text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor_text: In the Great Desert, one law is enforced over all others: water belongs to all.

name: Hoarding Recluse
oracle_text:
Reach, deathtouch
When Hoarding Recluse dies, put up to one other target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: To the spiders of Argoth, thopters were just bigger, crunchier flies.

name: Gnarlroot Pallbearer
oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarlroot Pallbearer enters the battlefield, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The flames of war consumed most of Argoth's treefolk. Vengeance consumed the rest.

name: Citanul Stalwart
oracle_text: {T}, Tap an untapped artifact or creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The endless grind of the Brothers' War had fouled Terisiare's land and blackened its skies. Argoth's defenders were determined to protect their isle from the same fate.

name: Burrowing Razormaw
oracle_text: When Burrowing Razormaw dies, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"That's odd. I don't remember seeing plans to dig a trench near here."
—Lognell, Argivian scout

name: Blitz Automaton
oracle_text:
Prototype {2}{R} - 3/2 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Haste
flavor_text: While Urza's machines favored defense, Mishra built his to end the war quickly.

name: Tomakul Sparksmith
oracle_text: When Tomakul Sparksmith enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Tomakul Scrapsmith. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Roc Hunter
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: "Never track the roc itself with your eyes, for it will swoop with the sun at its back and blind you. Instead, track its shadow and, when it's almost upon you, heave your javelin upward with all your might."

name: Over the Top
oracle_text: Each player reveals a number of cards from the top of their library equal to the number of nonland permanent they control, puts all permanent cards revealed that way onto the battlefield, and puts the rest into their graveyard.

name: Penregon Strongbull
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Penregon Strongbull gets +1/+1 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: His child-lifting act was second only to his cauldron-punting routine.

name: Horned Stoneseeker
oracle_text:
Menace
When Horned Stoneseeker enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
When Horned Stoneseeker leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a Powerstone.

name: Dwarven Forge-Chanter
oracle_text:
Ward—Pay 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Conscripted Infantry
oracle_text: When Conscripted Infantry dies, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
flavor_text: "Funny," remarked Laga to his squad. "Mishra's lackeys wear luxurious silks in their gilded palaces, while we toil in the trenches eating stale bread."

name: Goring Warplow
oracle_text:
Prototype {1}{B} - 1/1 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Deathtouch
flavor_text: Built to crush walls and wills in equal measure.

name: Trench Stalker
oracle_text: As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Trench Stalker has deathtouch and lifelink.
flavor_text: It can hear a panicked heartbeat from a thousand paces away.

name: Moment of Defiance
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Well? What are you waiting for? Let's not keep the buzzards waiting."

name: Gixian Infiltrator
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Gixian Infiltrator.
flavor_text: "Terisia City's fall is inevitable. My master's plan runs as sure and steady as the oil in my veins."

name: Emergency Weld
oracle_text: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
flavor_text: Scurrying repair bots quietly turned the tide of many battles, patching damaged automatons back into fighting form.

name: Carrion Locust
oracle_text:
Flying
When Carrion Locust enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, that player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: No honor. No glory. No leftovers.

name: Belligerent Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"The slivers became adept at provoking a fear response in other species."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Thorncaster Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: Every inch of a sliver's body is a potential claw, appendage, or projectile.

name: Magma Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
flavor_text: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

name: Synapse Sliver
oracle_text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Mesmeric Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then they may put that card on the bottom of that library.)
flavor_text:
"Wait, where am I? Who am I? And what are you?"
—Skyshroud secretkeeper, last words

name: Bonescythe Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text:
"Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Psychosis Crawler
oracle_text:
Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

name: Mazemind Tome
oracle_text:
{T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1.
{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card.
When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

name: Liquimetal Coating
oracle_text: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We've had a breakthrough on the fifth iteration. The subject's skin was entirely replaced within an hour, and he survived a full day after that!"
—Ashnod, to Mishra

name: Keening Stone
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The new prototype utilizing a rotational axis is marvelously effective: it makes me want to tear my own ears off."
—Ashnod, to her assistants

name: Key to the City
oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Presented to the Chief Artificer in recognition of his unparalleled service to Yoria."
—Rusted plaque

name: Journeyer's Kite
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Measure the angles carefully. Noet the gauge of the paper. By your sixth birthday, I expect a flying prototype."
—Tawnos, letter to Harbin

name: Inspiring Statuary
oracle_text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
flavor_text:
"In the early days, Urza's wondrous automatons were seen as symbols of hope and courage."
—*The Antiquities War*

name: Helm of the Host
oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary. That token gains haste.
Equip {5}

name: Ichor Wellspring
oracle_text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Should a single drop take hold, the oil begins to consume organic tissue and will multiply until it overwhelms its host."
—Yawgmoth, collected writings

name: Gilded Lotus
oracle_text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.
flavor_text:
"The lotus is ap otent but ephemeral source of power. To preserve its potency, lacquer carefully with a conductive coating."
—*Hurkyl's Metaphysics, vol. II*

name: Foundry Inspector
oracle_text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

name: Elsewhere Flask
oracle_text:
When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"My husband is clever enough to bottle the sky, and foolish enough to ignore its beauty."
—Queen Kayla bin-Kroog

name: Door to Nothingness

Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.
flavor_text:
"I have re-created a Thran portal at last! Before I inform Lord Urza, I'll teset it myself."
—Oryan, Urzan artificer, final research note

name: Defense Grid
oracle_text: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.
flavor_text:
"Properly installed, each powerstone emits a targeted electromagnetic field that halts momentum as sure as stone."
—*Tome of Obstructions*

name: Chromatic Star
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Cloud Key
oracle_text:
As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
